sqlMap.select: /* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER11select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_CLCT_DCS_AMT) AS 징수결정액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG) AS 징수결정액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RCP_AMT) AS 수납액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG) AS 수납액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RSR_AMT) AS 환부액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RSR_ATAG) AS 환부액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_NPM_LO_AMT) AS 불납결손액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG) AS 불납결손액본기까지누계 ,SUM(UNP_AMT) AS 미수납액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV053L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER12select */ SELECT SUM(TOT_CLCT_DCS_AMT) AS 총징수결정액 ,SUM(TOT_CLCT_DCS_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총징수결정액누계 ,SUM(TOT_RCP_AMT) AS 총수납액 ,SUM(TOT_RCP_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 총수납액계 ,SUM(TAXOFC_SIM_AMT) AS 세무서간이체액증감 ,SUM(TAXOFC_SIM_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 세무서간이체액증감계 ,SUM(RSRAM_RSR_DCS_AMT) AS 환급금처리환급결정액 ,SUM(RSRAM_RSR_DCS_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 환급금처리환급결정액계 ,SUM(RSRAM_HNDL_APP_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 환급금처리충당액 ,SUM(RSRAM_HNDL_APP_TOT_AMT) AS 환급금처리충당액계 ,SUM(RSRAM_HNDL_TA_AMT) AS 환급금처리계정이체액 ,SUM(RSRAM_HNDL_TA_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 환급금처리계정이체액계 ,SUM(CLCT_DCS_AMT) AS 징수결정액 ,SUM(TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG) AS 징수결정액계 ,SUM(RCP_AMT) AS 수납액 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG) AS 수납액계 ,SUM(NPM_LO_AMT) AS 불납결손액 ,SUM(NPM_LO_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 불납결손액계 ,SUM(UNP_AMT) AS 미수납액 ,SUM(UN_RCP_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 미수납액계 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV055L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER13select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_RCT_AMT) AS 영수액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCT_ATAG) AS 영수액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_PD_AMT) AS 납입액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_PD_ATAG) AS 납입액본기까지누계 ,SUM(UNP_AMT) AS 미납입액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV032L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER14select */ SELECT SUM(TXTN_NOC) AS 관세건수 ,SUM(COT) AS 수량 ,SUM(GOP_RLV_TMT) AS 물납해당세액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV050L WHERE PROF_YR = #strYr# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER15select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_TRAC_NTF_AMT) AS 이체통보액본기분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_TRAC_NTF_ATAG) AS 이체통보액본기까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_PMT_DCS_AMT) AS 지급결정액본기분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_PMT_DCS_ATAG) AS 지급결정액본기까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_PMT_AMT) AS 지급액본기분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_PMT_ATAG) AS 지급액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TRAC_NTF_NPMT_AMT) AS 미지급액이체통보액 ,SUM(PMT_DCS_NPMT_AMT) AS 미지급액지급결정액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV051L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER16select */ SELECT SUM(RSR_CFM_DCS_AMT) AS 환급확인또는결정금액본기분 ,SUM(RSR_CFM_DCS_ATAG) AS 환급확인또는결정금액누계 ,SUM(APP_AMT) AS 충당금본기분 ,SUM(APP_ATAG) AS 충당금액누계 ,SUM(TRAC_AMT) AS 이체금액본기분 ,SUM(TRAC_ATAG) AS 이체금액누계 ,SUM(PMT_AMT) AS 지금금액본기분 ,SUM(PMT_ATAG) AS 지급금액누계 ,SUM(DCSAM_NPMT_AMT) AS 결정금액중미지급액 ,SUM(TRACAM_NPMT_AMT) AS 이체금액중미지급액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS CNT FROM TWFAACAV018L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER17select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_EXPN_BND_AMT) AS 지출한도액본기분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_EXPN_BND_ATAG) AS 지출한도액본기까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액본기분 ,SUM(LTMN_TO_EXPN_ATAG) AS 지출액본기까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_REN_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액본월여입액 ,SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액본월과목등경정액 ,SUM(EXPN_SBTR_ATAG) AS 지출액차감누계액 ,SUM(EXPN_BND_BL) AS 지출한도잔액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV048L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER18select */ SELECT A.A1, A.A2, A.A3, A.A4, A.A5, A.A6, A.A7, A.A8, A.A9, A.A10, A.A_CNT ,B.B1, B.B2, B.B3, B.B4, B.B5, B.B6, B.B7, B.B8, B.B9, B.B10, B.B_CNT ,C.C1, C.C2, C.C3, C.C4, C.C5, C.C6, C.C7, C.C8, C.C9, C.C10, C.C_CNT ,NVL(A.A1,0) + NVL(B.B1,0)+ NVL(C.C1,0) TOT_SUM1 ,NVL(A.A2,0)+ NVL(B.B2,0)+ NVL(C.C2,0) TOT_SUM2 ,NVL(A.A3,0)+ NVL(B.B3,0)+ NVL(C.C3,0) TOT_SUM3 ,NVL(A.A4,0)+ NVL(B.B4,0)+ NVL(C.C4,0) TOT_SUM4 ,NVL(A.A5,0)+ NVL(B.B5,0)+ NVL(C.C5,0) TOT_SUM5 ,NVL(A.A6,0)+ NVL(B.B6,0)+ NVL(C.C6,0) TOT_SUM6 ,NVL(A.A7,0)+ NVL(B.B7,0)+ NVL(C.C7,0) TOT_SUM7 ,NVL(A.A8,0)+ NVL(B.B8,0)+ NVL(C.C8,0) TOT_SUM8 ,NVL(A.A9,0)+ NVL(B.B9,0)+ NVL(C.C9,0) TOT_SUM9 ,NVL(A.A10,0)+ NVL(B.B10,0)+ NVL(C.C10,0) TOT_SUM10 ,NVL(A.A_CNT,0)+ NVL(B.B_CNT,0)+ NVL(C.C_CNT,0) TOT_SUM_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TWFAACAV008M WHERE PROF_YR = #strYr#
AND MN_1_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_2_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_3_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_4_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_5_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_6_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_7_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_8_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_9_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_10_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_11_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_12_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND MN_13_ACP_DT IS NOT NULL
AND BLL_CD = '17' ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM (SELECT SUM(THMN_RCT_AMT) A1, SUM(LTMN_TO_RCT_ATAG) A2, SUM(THMN_REN_RCT_AMT) A3, SUM(SBTR_RCT_ATAG) A4, SUM(THMN_PMT_AMT) A5, SUM(LTMN_TO_PMT_ATAG) A6, SUM(THMN_DRIN_PMT_AMT) A7, SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_PMT_AMT) A8, SUM(SBTR_PMT_ATAG) A9, SUM(PMT_BL) A10, COUNT(SUM_DVSN_ID) A_CNT FROM TWFAACAV029L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' ) A, (SELECT SUM(THMN_RCT_AMT) B1, SUM(LTMN_TO_RCT_ATAG) B2, SUM(THMN_REN_RCT_AMT) B3, SUM(SBTR_RCT_ATAG) B4, SUM(THMN_PMT_AMT) B5, SUM(LTMN_TO_PMT_ATAG) B6, SUM(THMN_DRIN_PMT_AMT) B7, SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_PMT_AMT) B8, SUM(SBTR_PMT_ATAG) B9, SUM(PMT_BL) B10, COUNT(SUM_DVSN_ID) B_CNT FROM TWFAACAV030L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49') B, (SELECT SUM(THMN_RCT_AMT) C1, SUM(LTMN_TO_RCT_ATAG) C2, SUM(THMN_REN_RCT_AMT) C3, SUM(SBTR_RCT_ATAG) C4, SUM(THMN_PMT_AMT) C5, SUM(LTMN_TO_PMT_ATAG) C6, SUM(THMN_DRIN_PMT_AMT) C7, SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_PMT_AMT) C8, SUM(SBTR_PMT_ATAG) C9, SUM(PMT_BL) C10, COUNT(SUM_DVSN_ID) C_CNT FROM TWFAACAV028L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49') C

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER19select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_TUM_BND_AMT) AS 조체급한도액본월분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_TUM_BND_ATAG) AS 조체급한도액본월까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_TUM_CMD_AMT) AS 조체급명령액본월분 ,SUM(LTMN_TO_TUM_CMD_ATAG) AS 조체급명령액전월까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_REN_TUM_CMD_AMT) AS 조체급명령액본월반납액 ,SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_TUM_CMD_AMT) AS 본월과목등경정액조체급명령액 ,SUM(SBTR_ATAG_TUM_CMD_AMT) AS 조체급명령액차감누계액 ,SUM(TUM_BND_BL) AS 조체급한도액잔액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV059L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER20select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_INC_AMT) AS 수입액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_INC_ATAG) AS 수입액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_PMT_AMT) AS 지급액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_PMT_ATAG) AS 지급액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_BL) AS 본기말잔액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV060L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER21select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_CLCT_DCS_AMT) AS 징수결정액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG) AS 징수결정액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RCP_AMT) AS 수납액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG) AS 수납액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RSR_AMT) AS 환부액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RSR_ATAG) AS 환부액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_NPM_LO_AMT) 불납결손액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG) AS 불납결손액본기까지누계 ,SUM(UN_RCP_AMT) AS 미수납액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV026L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER22select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액본기분 ,SUM(ELT_TO_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액전기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_REN_AMT) AS 반납액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_AMT) AS 본기과목등경정액 ,SUM(FUND_EXPN_SBTR_AMT) AS 기금지출차감액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV027L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER28select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_CRFW_AMT) AS 전년도이월액 ,SUM(THYR_CRFW_AMT) AS 본년도수령액 ,SUM(THYR_RCIT_AMT) AS 본년도감소불출액 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_OUT_AMT) AS 본년도감소세입납부액 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_AMT) AS 본년도감소액계 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_CSH) AS 본년도말현재액현금 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_BOK_DEPO_AMT) AS 본년도말현재액한국은행예탁 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_ATAG) AS 본년도말현재액계 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV014L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER29select */ SELECT A.EXPR001 AS 수입액본기분 ,A.EXPR002 AS 수입액분기까지누계 ,A.EXPR003 AS 세입납부액본기분 ,A.EXPR004 AS 세입납부액본기까지누계 ,A.EXPR005 AS 수입세입우계차감액 ,B.EXPR006 AS 지출액본기분 ,B.EXPR007 AS 지출액전기까지누계 ,B.EXPR008 AS 지출액본기반납액 ,B.EXPR009 AS 지출액본기과목등경정액 ,B.EXPR0010 AS 지출액차감누계액 ,'' AS 지출액본기반납액잔액 ,A.CNT1 AS 수입 ,B.CNT2 AS 지출 FROM( SELECT SUM(TQR_INC_EXPN_AMT) AS EXPR001 ,SUM(TQR_INC_EXPN_ATAG) AS EXPR002 ,SUM(TQR_REV_PD_AMT) AS EXPR003 ,SUM(TQR_TO_REV_PD_ATAG) AS EXPR004 ,SUM(INC_REV_SBTR_ATAG) AS EXPR005 ,COUNT(SUM_DVSN_ID) AS CNT1 FROM TWFAACAV034L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND EXP_DVSN_CD ='1' AND SUM_DVSN_ID ='49' )A, ( SELECT SUM(TQR_INC_EXPN_AMT) AS EXPR006 ,SUM(TQR_INC_EXPN_ATAG) AS EXPR007 ,SUM(TQR_REV_PD_AMT) AS EXPR008 ,SUM(TQR_TO_REV_PD_ATAG) AS EXPR009 ,SUM(INC_REV_SBTR_ATAG) AS EXPR0010 ,COUNT(SUM_DVSN_ID) AS CNT2 FROM TWFAACAV034L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND EXP_DVSN_CD ='2' AND SUM_DVSN_ID ='49' )B

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER30select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_CRFW_AMT) AS 전년도이월발생액중이월액 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_VRT_AMT) AS 전년도이전발생액중증감액 ,SUM(TQR_EXPN_AMT) AS 본년도발생액 ,SUM(OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 발생액합계 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_DAPR_AMT) AS 전년도이전발생액중소멸액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_DAPR_AMT) AS 본년도발생액중소멸액 ,SUM(DAPR_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 소멸액합계 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년도이전이행기한도래액 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 전년도이전이행기한미도액 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 전년도이전발생액계 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생액이행기한도래액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_PFM_DDLN_UN_ADVT_AMT) AS 본년도발생액이행기한미도래액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액계 ,SUM(THYR_ED_GEN_SUM_AM) AS 본년도말일반분합계 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_MNG_ASG_AMT) AS 전년도이전발생액중관리정지액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_MNG_ASG_AMT) AS 본년도발생액중관리정지액 ,SUM(MNG_ASG_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 관리정지액합계 ,SUM(LTYR_BK_OGN_LO_AMT) AS 전년도이전발생액결손액 ,SUM(THYR_LO_AMT) AS 본년도발생액결손액 ,SUM(LO_ATAG) AS 결손액합계 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_SUM_AM) AS 본년도말현재합계 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV013L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER31select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT) AS 전년도말현재액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_BND_AMT) AS 본년도발생액중한도액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_LBT_AC_AMT) AS 본년도발생액체무행위액 ,SUM(THYR_OGN_MGN_SUM_AM) AS 본년도발생액중차액 ,SUM(TOT_SUM_AM) AS 계 ,SUM(THYR_SBJ_DAPR_AMT) AS 본년도상황또는소멸액 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) AS 본년도말현재액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV036L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' AND TAX_DVSN_CD = '2'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER32select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도말현재액가격 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_COT) AS 본년도비교증감수량 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_PR) AS 본년도비교감증감가격 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV031L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER33select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도말현재액가격 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_COT) AS 본년도비교증감수량 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_PR) AS 본년도비교증감가격 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV046L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER34select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 전년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(LTYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 전년도말현재액가격 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_COT) AS 본년도증가수량 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_PR) AS 본년도증가가격 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_COT) AS 본년도감소수량 ,SUM(THYR_DECR_PR) AS 본년도감소가격 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_COT) AS 본년도비교증감수량 ,SUM(THYR_CMPR_VRT_PR) AS 본년도비교증감가격 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_COT) AS 본년도말현재액수량 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT_PR) AS 본년도말현재액가격 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV045L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER35select */ SELECT SUM(LTYR_ED_CRFW_SHCN) AS 전년도이월장수 ,SUM(LTYR_CRFW_PF_AMT) AS 전년도이월권면액 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_SHCN) AS 본년도증가장수 ,SUM(THYR_INCR_PF_AMT) AS 본년도증가권면액 ,SUM(THYR_MIS_SHCN) AS 본년도감소장수 ,SUM(THYR_MIS_PF_AMT) AS 본년도감수권면액 ,SUM(THYR_ED_CRNT_STK_SHCN) AS 본년도말현재고장수 ,SUM(THYR_ED_PRST_AMT) AS 본년도말현재고권면액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV057L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER41select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_CLCT_DCS_AMT) AS 징수결정액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG) AS 징수결정액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RCP_AMT) AS 수납액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG) AS 수납액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_RSR_AMT) AS 환부액본기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RSR_ATAG) AS 환부액본기까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_NPM_LO_AMT) AS 불납결손액분기분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG) AS 불납결손액본기까지누계 ,SUM(UNP_AMT) AS 미수납액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV054L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER42select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_FND_ALC_AMT) AS 본분기자금배정액, SUM(TQR_TO_FND_ALC_ATAG) AS 본분기까지자금배정액누계, SUM(TQR_EXPN_AMT) AS 본분기지출액, SUM(ELT_TO_EXPN_ATAG) AS 전기까지지출액누계, SUM(TQR_RED_AMT) AS 본분기여입액, SUM(TQR_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_AMT) AS 본분기과목등경정액, SUM(EXPN_SBTR_ATAG) AS 지출차감액누계, SUM(FND_ALC_BL) AS 자금배정잔액, COUNT(BLL_CD) AS CNT FROM TWFAACAV021L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER51select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_INC_AMT) AS 수입액본월분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_INC_ATAG) AS 수입액본월까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_RSR_AMT) AS 환급액본월분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_RSR_ATAG) AS 환급액본월까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_NPM_LO_AMT) AS 불납결손액본월분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG) AS 불납결손액본월까지누계 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV012L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER52select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_EXPN_BND_AMT) AS 지출한도액본기분 ,SUM(THMN_TO_EXPN_BND_ATAG) AS 지출한도액본기까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액본월분 ,SUM(LTMN_TO_EXPN_ATAG) AS 지출액전월까지누계 ,SUM(THMN_EXPN_PCRT_AMT) AS 지출액본월환입액 ,SUM(THMN_SUBJ_ASO_RCTF_EXPN_AMT) AS 지출액과본월과목등경정액 ,SUM(SBTR_ATAG) AS 차감누계액 ,SUM(EXPN_BND_BL) AS 지출한도잔액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV011L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER53select */ SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN THYR_INCR_PF_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS 세입본월분 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN REV_ATAG ELSE 0 END) AS 세입누계 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN THMN_NREV_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS 세입외본월분 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN NREV_ATAG ELSE 0 END) AS 세입외누계 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN THMN_EXP_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS 세출본월분 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN EXP_ATAG ELSE 0 END) AS 세출누계 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN THMN_NEXP_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS 세출외본월분 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN NEXP_ATAG ELSE 0 END) AS 세출외누계 ,SUM(CASE WHEN PROF_DRTR_SRNO = '002' THEN NAFD_BL ELSE 0 END) AS 국고금잔액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV063L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER54select */ SELECT SUM(TQR_RCP_AMT) AS 수납액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_RCP_OEP_RTRN_AMT) AS 수납과오납금반환액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_RCP_SBTR_AMT) AS 수납차감액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_PMT_CMD_AMT) AS 지급명령액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_PMT_SBTR_AMT) AS 지금액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_PMT_AMT) AS 반납액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_REN_AMT) AS 지급차감액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_DFT_SBST_RSR_NPS_AMT) AS 방위세대체환급미보전액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_BL) AS 잔액본월분 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG) AS 수납액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_OEP_RTRN_RCP_ATAG) AS 과오납금반환액수납본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_RCP_SBTR_ATAG) AS 수납차감액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_PMT_CMD_ATAG) AS 지급명령액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_REN_ATAG) AS 지급액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_PMT_SBTR_ATAG) AS 반납액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_PMT_ATAG) AS 지급차감액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_DFT_SBST_RSR_NPS_ATAG) AS 방위세대체환급미보전액본월까지누계 ,SUM(TQR_TO_BL_AGG_AM) AS 잔액본월까지누계 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV015L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||#strMm# AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'

/* faa/cav/023/FAACAV023ER55select */ SELECT SUM(THMN_INC_SHCN) AS 수입본월분장수 ,SUM(THMN_INC_PF_AMT) AS 수입본월분권면액 ,SUM(INC_AGG_SHCN) AS 수입누계장수 ,SUM(INC_AGG_PF_AMT) AS 수입누계권면액 ,SUM(THMN_OUT_SHCN) AS 불출본월분장수 ,SUM(THMN_OUT_PF_AMT) AS 반납액본월분 ,SUM(OUT_AGG_SHCN) AS 불출누계장수 ,SUM(OUT_PF_ATAG) AS 불출누계권면액 ,SUM(BL_CLCT_AMT) AS 잔액장수 ,SUM(BL_PF_AMT) AS 잔액권면액 ,COUNT(BLL_CD) AS 계산증명기관수 FROM TWFAACAV058L WHERE PROF_YM = #strYr#||'00' AND SUM_DVSN_ID = '49'
